Description:
P/SPD/230322/01-312401667
Work on or from the perimeter scaffolding erected on site unless to make safe by a competent scaffolder because you have failed to ensure that the supporting structure of the scaffold is stable and has sufficient strength and rigidity in that, the base plates are correctly positioned

IN/SPD250322/01 - 312401873
You have failed to properly plan and thereby ensure that the work at height involved in the sheeting of the roof trusses at the above site is carried out in a manner which is, so far as is reasonably practicable, safe in that; you have failed to take suitable and sufficient measures to address the risk posed by internal falls through open rafters during this work.

IN/SPD250322/02 - 312401741
You, as the Principal Contractor, have failed to ensure that there are welfare facilities, sufficient to comply with Schedule 2 of the Construction (Design and Management) Regulations 2015, in place at the above construction site when there is construction work ongoing in that you have failed to provide suitable and sufficient washing facilities.
